/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and trucks, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in urban landscapes. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy clouds, providing a serene contrast to the busy street below.
